aws:forecast.aws:title: Friday
aws:forecast.aws:prediction: Areas of low clouds and fog in the morning then sunny. Highs in the upper 60s to mid 70s at the beaches to the lower 80s inland.

aws:forecast.aws:title: Saturday
aws:forecast.aws:prediction: Areas of low clouds and fog in the morning then sunny. Highs in the lower to mid 70s at the beaches to the lower to mid 80s inland.

aws:forecast.aws:title: Sunday
aws:forecast.aws:prediction: Areas of low clouds and fog in the morning then sunny. Highs in the lower to mid 70s at the beaches to the lower to mid 80s inland.

aws:forecast.aws:title: Monday

aws:forecast.aws:prediction: Night through morning low clouds and fog...otherwise mostly clear. Lows around 60. Highs in the mid to upper 60s at the beaches to the 70s inland.
